attributes.action: Allow local elections to take place in response to the COVID-19 ban
attributes.background: The government should not have taken the vote away from the electoral due to COVID-19 as democracy is one of our fundamental British values and therefore I believe not allowing the public to vote is disgraceful as democracy is unable to continue which as a nation we do not stand for!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302247

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
